MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Rhos affecting properties in Cynlas Street, King Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 1:07PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:40PM on 23rd December 2020.
